A typographic scale as produced by igx-type-scale.
The categories from the typographic scale used for type styles.
Assigns type scale category config properties
as style rules wherever this mixin is included.
A type scale map reference as produces by igx-type-scale.
The type scale category config you want to use as CSS style rules.
Add the h1 styles to custom CSS selector.
Transforms a type style map into a font style rule assigned to a css variable.
The custom CSS variable name.
A type style map reference as produces by igx-type-style.
Optional prefix.
Assign the h1 styles to custom CSS property using the CSS font shorthand syntax.
Adds typography styles for h1-h6, paragraph and creates
custom typography class selectors. The produces styles
are based on the passed type scale. If omitted the
default-type-scale will be used.
The font family to be used across all typographic elements.
A type scale map as produced by igx-type-scale.
